sentences.en: The ecosystem will be thrown out of whack.
This unique ecosystem may soon be under pressure.
sentences.cn: 这个独特的生态系统可能很快就会面临压力。

sentences.en: The question of ecosystem stability is complicated.
sentences.cn: 生态系统稳定性的问题是复杂的。
